title: I still haven't got my RP
body:
Apparently all my tickets that i sent are "SOLVED", and yet I received no reply from them, and no RP.

Tell me something new now Wrechman.

replies.body:
Hey there,

All the open tickets regarding missing RP were marked as resolved when [the fix was applied](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/cLeYquE0-rp-card-redemption-issue-21042016), however there are a few outliers who are still yet to receive their RP.

Please re-open your ticket if you're still yet to receive your RP or if you're unable to do that, [submit a new ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new).
That's strange i got all my RP, and no reply on my ticket O.O
